title: Refactor into separate Python module structure
description:
Refactor the project structure to create a separate Python module for shared code.

Current structure has all code together. Need to:
- Create conduit_transcripts as a standalone Python module with its own pyproject.toml
- Move shared code from src/conduit_transcripts/ to top-level conduit_transcripts/
- Update main pyproject.toml to only include app and CLI dependencies
- Create separate Dockerfiles for app and CLI containers
- Update docker-compose.yml for new container structure

The conduit_transcripts module will contain:
- chat/ (RAG functionality)
- config/ (settings)
- database/ (PostgreSQL + pgvector)
- models/ (SQLAlchemy models)
- search/ (search actions)
- transcription/ (audio processing, core logic)
- utils/ (cache, logging, RSS, text, tracker)

App and CLI will import this module and add their specific dependencies (FastAPI, click, rich, uvicorn, etc.)

title: Create Docker Compose infrastructure for transcript services
description:
Design and implement Docker Compose configuration for three services:

1. PostgreSQL Database Service:
   - PostgreSQL with pgvector extension
   - Persistent volume for data storage
   - Health checks and initialization scripts
   - Environment configuration

2. Transcript Ingestion Service:
   - Python service for processing transcripts
   - Access to transcript files via volume mount
   - Embedding generation capability
   - Scheduled or on-demand execution

3. MCP Server Service:
   - API server for Claude integration
   - Vector search capabilities
   - Connects to PostgreSQL
   - Exposes MCP-compliant endpoints

Include networking, volume management, environment variables, and orchestration for local development and deployment.
